description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing the management of medical records in healthcare, improving security, interoperability, and data ownership while tackling challenges such as data privacy compliance and scalability.
keywords: blockchain, healthcare, medical records, data security, interoperability, patient data ownership, healthcare technology, smart contracts, HIPAA compliance, GDPR, patient empowerment, healthcare innovation
title: Blockchain and Medical Records: Revolutionizing Healthcare
